title: Leading car brand sales in Italy 2016 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Brands on X-axis for 4 groups 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Units sold.
Brand Fiat had the maximum Units sold among all 4 groups, and it was for 2017. The minimum Units sold was observed in Brand Jeep/Dodge for 2016.
The maximum Units sold for 2017 that was found in Brand Fiat was 8.13 times larger than the minimum Units sold observed in Brand Jeep/Dodge.
On average, the Brand Fiat had the highest Units sold for all 4 groups 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. Whereas Dacia had the lowest average Units sold.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Brands on X-axis for 4 groups 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Units sold.
For Brand Fiat, 2017 had the highest Units sold 402430.0 among the 4 groups and in Jeep/Dodge, 2016 had the lowest Units sold 40456.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Brands on X-axis for 4 groups 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Units sold.
Brand Fiat had the maximum Units sold among all 4 groups, and it was for 2017. The minimum Units sold was observed in Brand Jeep/Dodge for 2016.
The maximum Units sold for 2017 that was found in Brand Fiat was 8.13 times larger than the minimum Units sold observed in Brand Jeep/Dodge.
On average, the Brand Fiat had the highest Units sold for all 4 groups 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. Whereas Dacia had the lowest average Units sold.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Units sold on the Y-axis for 10 different Brands for 4 groups 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
For Brand Fiat, 2017 had the highest Units sold 402430.0 among the 4 groups and in Jeep/Dodge, 2016 had the lowest Units sold 40456.0.
For Brand Fiat, 2017 had the maximum Units sold and it saw the lowest in Brand Jeep/Dodge out of all 10 Brands.
The maximum Units sold for 2017 that was found in Brand Fiat was 8.13 times larger than the minimum Units sold observed in Brand Jeep/Dodge.
Out of all 4 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Units sold was found in case of 2017.
2017 had the maximum Units sold out of all 4 groups in Brand Fiat followed by 2017 in Fiat, and the minimum Units sold is found for 2016 in Jeep/Dodge.
Averaging all 4 groups 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019, the Brand Fiat is the maximum Units sold and Dacia is the minimum Units sold.
